metachat.pp.MetaChatDB

metachat.pp.MetaChatDB(species='mouse')[source]

Extract metabolite-sensor pairs from MetaChatDB.

Parameters:

species – The species of the ligand-receptor pairs. Choose between ‘mouse’ and ‘human’.

Returns:

df_metasen – A pandas DataFrame of the MS pairs with the six columns representing the Metabolite, Sensor, Metabolite.Pathway, Sensor.Pathway, Metabolite.Names, Long.Range.Channel respectively.

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame
